H0.text: Hot gases make up most of the surface of Earth.

H1.text: Dry land is the feature that makes up most of the surface of Earth.

H2.text: Craters make up most of the surface of Earth.

H3.text: Water makes up most of the surface of Earth.

A4.text: Most of Earth's surface is ocean water: 70.8% or 361 million km2 (139 million sq mi).

A5.text: Earth's land covers 29.2%, or 149 million km2 (58 million sq mi) of Earth's surface.
